packages.title: Colonial Heritage Discovery
packages.description: Explore the magical walled city of Cartagena, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Walk through cobblestone streets, visit colonial mansions, and immerse yourself in 500 years of Caribbean history.
highlights: Walking tour of the Walled City

packages.title: Caribbean Beach & Culture
packages.description: Combine the historic charm of Cartagena with beautiful Caribbean beaches. Perfect blend of cultural exploration and tropical relaxation on pristine white sand beaches.

packages.title: Culinary Caribbean Adventure
packages.description: Taste the flavors of the Caribbean coast with this gastronomic journey. Experience fusion cuisine, traditional dishes, tropical fruits, and the best seafood of the Colombian coast.
highlights: Caribbean cooking class with local chef

packages.title: Island Hopping Adventure
packages.description: Explore the stunning archipelago around Cartagena with crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, and pristine beaches. Perfect for water sports enthusiasts and beach lovers.

packages.title: Romantic Getaway Package
packages.description: Perfect romantic escape in one of South America's most romantic cities. Luxury accommodations, private experiences, and unforgettable moments in the Caribbean pearl.
highlights: Luxury boutique hotel in Old City

packages.title: Family Caribbean Fun
packages.description: Family-friendly Caribbean adventure with activities for all ages. Explore history, enjoy beaches, and create lasting memories in this magical coastal city.
